/usr/ports/devel/zeroinstall-injector (Dylan Cochran)
2011-12-01 FreeBSD has removed 0install from ports in order to promote the use of their new PBI system, so you should install from source instead.
The injector has been tested on Solaris and works fine. Use the source package to install.

html.p: If an injector package for your distribution is listed above, install that and then try using it! Otherwise, get the source package instead!
